Room.Name: Rosecrest Street/Hillcrest Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Rosecrest Street and Hillcrest Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Hillcrest Drive runs east of here towards the large family estates, and past the numerous monuments and fountains dedicated to the people who are brave enough to stand up to tyranny and oppression. Rosecrest Street runs north and south, parallel to the City Wall on the west side of the street.
